function.name: accessibility_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on an accessibility feature for a SmartThings device using voice commands.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the accessibility feature.

predefinedAccessibilityMenu.description: The predefined accessibility menu option to turn on.
